item.description:
债务、赤字让 DoubleLine、TCW 回避多头债券

Debt, deficit have DoubleLine, TCW shunning long bonds

item.title: 泰尔支持的迷幻药制造商 Atai 将与 Beckley 合并
item.description: Atai Life Sciences NV 公司同意收购规模较小的英国竞争对手 Beckley Psytech Ltd. 公司的全部控制权，并筹集了 3000 万美元的新股本，以巩固其作为治疗精神疾病的迷幻药领先制造商之一的地位。【原文：Atai Life Sciences NV agreed to buy full control of smaller UK rival Beckley Psytech Ltd. and raised $30 million in fresh equity, as it seeks to cement its position as one of the leading makers of psychedelic drugs for mental health conditions.】

item.title: 孟加拉国缩小财政赤字，削减预算支出
item.description: 孟加拉国临时政府在其首份预算案中提出了减少财政赤字和降低支出的目标，因为这个南亚国家的目标是满足未来获得国际货币基金组织贷款的条件，这对遭受危机重创的经济至关重要。【原文：Bangladesh’s interim government targeted a smaller fiscal deficit and lower spending in its maiden budget, as the South Asian nation aims to meet conditions for future International Monetary Fund loans, critical for the crisis-hit economy.】

item.title: 摩根大通策略师警告美股上涨面临滞胀风险
item.description: 摩根大通银行（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：Higher prices and weaker US economic growth over the summer are likely to threaten the S&P 500’s rally, according to JPMorgan Chase & Co. strategists.】

item.title: 卡尼旨在通过释放内部贸易来挫败特朗普的关税攻势
item.description: 加拿大总理马克-卡尼（Mark Carney）正在推动美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）征收关税，迫使加拿大各省之间实现贸易自由化，从而抵消美国总统特朗普征收关税给经济带来的痛苦。【原文：Prime Minister Mark Carney is pushing to offset the economic pain caused by US President Donald Trump’s tariffs by compelling Canadian provinces to liberalize trade with one another.】

item.title: 买家罢工冲击美国长债，DoubleLine 和 Pimco 避而远之
item.description: 对于 DoubleLine Capital 来说，在 30 年期美国国债问题上有两种方法可供选择：要么尽量回避，要么直接做空。【原文：For DoubleLine Capital, there are two approaches to consider when it comes to 30-year US Treasuries: either avoid them, to the degree they can, or outright short them.】

item.title: 印度寻求国营企业更多更频繁地分红
item.description: 据知情人士透露，印度政府正要求国营公司在本财年将股息支付额提高约 25%，因为这个亚洲第三大经济体正寻求在动荡的全球环境中加强财政。【原文：The Indian government is asking state-run companies to increase dividend payouts by about 25% this financial year as Asia’s third-largest economy seeks to bolster finances in a volatile global environment, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 分析师的看涨评论掩盖了美股上涨的疲软信念
item.description: 根据 Jefferies LLC 的分析，在经历了 5 月份的疯狂反弹后，华尔街分析师目前对 S&P 500 指数中单个公司的买入评级超过了 20 多年来的任何时候。【原文：After a furious May rally, Wall Street analysts now have more buy ratings on individual companies in the S&P 500 Index than at any time in more than two decades, according to a Jefferies LLC analysis.】

item.title: 英国将增加开支，欧洲国防股再创新高
item.description: 周一，由于英国公布了扩充潜艇舰队和加强核威慑力量的计划，欧洲高涨的国防类股再次获得提振。【原文：Europe’s high-flying defense stocks got another boost on Monday as the UK unveiled plans to expand its submarine fleet and shore up its nuclear deterrent.】

item.title: 印尼贸易顺差缩小，全球关税担忧促进从中国的进口
item.description: 有迹象表明，进口商正在囤积来自中国和其他主要贸易伙伴的商品，以减轻全球关税上涨带来的风险，印尼因此出现了五年多来最小的贸易顺差。【原文：Indonesia posted its smallest trade surplus in more than five years on signs importers are stocking up on goods from China and other key trading partners to mitigate the risks of rising global tariffs.】

item.title: 日本将在 2030 年前寻求 8400 亿美元的外来投资
item.description: 日本计划到 2030 年将引进外国直接投资的目标提高到 120 万亿日元（约合 8400 亿美元），旨在吸引更多的海外资本，帮助重振陷入困境的地区经济，解决劳动力短缺问题。【原文：Japan plans to raise its incoming foreign direct investment target to ¥120 trillion ($840 billion) by 2030, aiming to attract more overseas capital to help revitalize struggling regional economies and address labor shortages.】

item.title: 南非农产品出口激增 10%，美国出货量攀升
item.description: 一家行业机构称，由于港口业绩改善和对美国的货运量攀升，第一季度南非农产品出口同比增长 10%，达到 33.6 亿美元。【原文：South African agricultural exports rose 10% in the first quarter to $3.36 billion from a year earlier as port performance improved and shipments to the US climbed, an industry body said.】

item.title: 美英关税协议达成后英国工厂 "迎来转机
item.description: 一项受到密切关注的调查显示，在基尔-斯塔默（Keir Starmer）和唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）政府就降低部分美国关税达成有限协议后，英国工厂在 5 月份出现了 "转机 "迹象。【原文：British factories showed signs of “turning a corner” in May following a limited deal between Keir Starmer and Donald Trump’s governments to lower some US tariffs, a closely watched survey showed.】

item.title: 私募股权投资回报减少，高管寻求安抚焦躁的投资者
item.description:
随着收购高管们齐聚柏林参加一年一度的盛会，一些人开始谈论这个曾经占据主导地位的行业正在成为一个利基资产类别。【原文：

As buyout executives gather for their yearly jamboree in Berlin, some are talking about the once dominant industry becoming a niche asset class.

item.title: 奇货可居苹果为何难以走出中国 (播客)
item.description: 特朗普总统希望苹果公司在美国生产 iPhone。苹果公司自己也在谈论— 而且在某种程度上已经— 将更多的生产转移到其他国家，比如印度。但实际上，苹果仍然深深地扎根于中国供应链。事实上，苹果公司的崛起，特别是 iPhone 的崛起，正是中美两国经济联系的最好例证。虽然这对全世界的股东来说都是丰硕的成果，也有助于苹果公司的发展。【原文：President Trump wants Apple to make iPhones in America. The company itself has talked about — and to some extent already has been — moving more of its production to other countries, like India. But in reality, Apple remains deeply, deeply enmeshed in the Chinese supply chain. In fact, the rise of Apple, and the iPhone specifically, is the ultimate example of the link between the American and Chinese economies. And while this has been fruitful for shareholders all around the world, and contribute】

item.title: 英国挑战者银行扩大贷款规模，Monzo 盈利飙升
item.description: Monzo Bank Ltd.表示，随着贷款额的激增，该公司去年的利润翻了两番，收入也随之增加，这家移动银行正努力争取最终在股市上市。【原文：Monzo Bank Ltd. said its profit quadrupled last year with a burgeoning loan book lifting revenue, as the mobile bank works toward an eventual stock market debut.】

item.title: 据说印尼电信将考虑出售医疗保健公司 AdMedika
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，印尼电信公司正在考虑出售 AdMedika 公司，并为这家医疗保健公司寻求至少 1 亿美元的收购。【原文：PT Telekomunikasi Indonesia is considering selling AdMedika and seeking at least $100 million for the health-care firm, according to people familiar with the situation.】

item.title: 贝恩集团为葡萄酒制造商 Vinarchy 寻求 4.54 亿美元贷款
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，包括贝恩资本（Bain Capital）和索纳资产管理有限公司（Sona Asset Management Ltd.）在内的一个名为澳大利亚葡萄酒控股有限公司（Australian Wine Holdco Ltd.）的财团正在为其去年收购的一家酿酒商寻求 7 亿澳元（4.54 亿美元）的贷款。【原文：A consortium called Australian Wine Holdco Ltd. that includes Bain Capital and Sona Asset Management Ltd. is seeking an A$700 million ($454 million) loan for a winemaker they acquired last year, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 马达加斯加寻求阿联酋投资以抵消美国关税威胁
item.description: 马达加斯加正在寻求增加来自阿拉伯联合酋长国的投资，以刺激其旅游业和能源行业的增长。【原文：Madagascar is seeking to boost investments from the United Arab Emirates to spur growth in its tourism and energy sectors, a partnership that’s become more urgent as its faces steep tariffs from the US.】

item.title: Indivior 计划在将主要业务转移至美国后取消伦敦上市计划
item.description: Indivior Plc 表示，在该制药商将主要交易转移到美国近一年后，它计划取消在伦敦的二次上市，这标志着该公司最近一次离开英国资本市场。【原文：Indivior Plc said it plans to cancel its secondary listing in London nearly a year after the drugmaker shifted its primary trading to the US, marking the latest departure from the UK’s capital markets.】

item.title: 英国航空公司老板认为跨大西洋航线减速正在恢复
item.description: IAG SA 表示，在过去的三周里，跨大西洋航线的需求疲软已出现缓解迹象，因为在经历了一段不确定时期后，旅游前景开始趋于稳定。【原文：IAG SA said the weaker demand on transatlantic routes has shown signs of easing over the past three weeks as the travel outlook begins to stabilize following a period of uncertainty.】

item.title: 特朗普加征关税前出口激增，瑞士经济增长被上调
item.description: 进入 2025 年，瑞士的增长势头比最初估计的还要明显，经济扩张速度为两年来最快。【原文：Switzerland’s growth spurt into 2025 was even more pronounced than initially estimated, with the economy expanding at the fastest pace in two years.】

item.title: 印度将开放旗舰电动汽车制造政策以吸引全球巨头
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士称，印度将向全球电动汽车制造商开放其降低进口关税以换取在印度生产的旗舰政策的申请。【原文：India is set to open applications for its flagship policy offering lower import duties to global electric vehicle makers in exchange for manufacturing in India, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 阿托斯获得法国政府战略计算资产收购要约
item.description: Atos SE称，它收到了法国政府对该集团先进计算资产的收购要约，该资产对法国核工业至关重要，价值4.1亿欧元（4.67亿美元）。【原文：Atos SE said it received an offer from the French state for the group’s advanced computing assets, which values the unit deemed critical to the country’s nuclear industry at €410 million ($467 million).】

item.title: 英国全国房屋价格指数（Nationwide）称英国 5 月房价意外上涨
item.description: 据英国最大的抵押贷款机构之一称，5 月份英国房价意外上涨，这表明在购房者减税政策到期后，住房需求依然保持弹性。【原文：UK house prices unexpectedly rose in May, in a sign that demand for housing remains resilient following the expiry of a tax break for buyers, according to one of Britain’s largest mortgage lenders.】

item.title: 拉托斯寻求从北欧建筑公司首次公开募股中获得 1.6 亿美元资金
item.description: Sentia AS 是 Ratos AB 旗下的一家建筑公司，在瑞典和挪威都有项目，该公司在奥斯陆提交了首次公开募股申请，希望募集多达 16 亿克朗（1.6 亿美元）的资金。【原文：Sentia AS, a construction company owned by Ratos AB with projects in Sweden and Norway, filed for an initial public offering in Oslo where it hopes to raise as much as 1.6 billion kroner ($160 million).】

item.title: 汤姆-克鲁斯的最后一部《碟中谍》荣登中国票房榜榜首
item.description: 汤姆-克鲁斯的电影在中国重回榜首。不可能的任务不可能的任务--终极审判》无视华盛顿和北京之间的贸易和地缘政治紧张局势，创下了今年美国电影在中国的最大开画纪录。【原文：Tom Cruise’s film is back on top in China. Mission: Impossible – The Final Reckoning posted the biggest opening for a US film in the country this year, defying trade and geopolitical tensions between Washington and Beijing.】

item.title: 挪威将无人机检查海上石油平台提升到新水平
item.description: 挪威的一个大型油田正在将该行业使用无人机进行安全检查的做法推向一个新的高度，该油田永久性地安装了一架飞机，可在岸上进行远程操作。【原文：A major Norwegian oil field is taking the industry’s use of drones for safety inspections to a new level, with a permanently installed aircraft that’s operated remotely from the shore.】

item.title: 普京的央行行长面临削减创纪录高利率的压力
item.description: 俄罗斯央行行长曾因在乌克兰入侵后帮助挽救国家经济而受到称赞，但他正面临着越来越大的压力，要求他扭转借贷成本创历史新高的趋势，因为人们担心借贷成本会给企业带来损失。【原文：The Bank of Russia’s governor, who was praised for helping save the country’s economy after the invasion of Ukraine, is facing mounting pressure to reverse course on record-high borrowing costs amid worries over their toll on business.】
